flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project was created by Ichiamsa YAGI who is a professor of the Iwate University department os education in Japan. Also he is a CEO of EWI(Experimenta; Workshop Iwate). His company develop the science teaching equipment that will encourage the growth of science in school and universities thought out the world.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This project was created by Ichiamsa YAGI who is a professor of the Iwate University department os education in Japan. Also he is a CEO of EWI(Experimenta; Workshop Iwate). His company develop the science teaching equipment that will encourage the growth of science in school and universities thought out the world.

Tools
  • liquid nitrogen, gloves, wood tong,
guide.summary: We will demonstrate the closest things to perpetual motion in nature. By using magnet levitation(the Miessner effect) we will show a super-conducting object floating above strong magnets virtually eliminating friction between the object and it's track.
guide.title: Superconductivity Roller Caster and Mebius Ring
